DataElement.preferredName: Current Brain Neoplasm SNOMED-CT Primary Anatomic Site Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The SNOMED code representing  the primary anatomic location of current brain cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Current Brain Neoplasm Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine Clinical Terms Primary Anatomic Site
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time._A benign or malignant neoplasm that arises from or metastasizes to the brain._Published by the College of American Pathologists, the Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine Clinical Terms is a combination of content of SNOMED Reference Terminology and READ codes._Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._Named locations of or within the body.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A benign or malignant neoplasm that arises from or metastasizes to the brain.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
A benign or malignant neoplasm that arises from or metastasizes to the brain.

Concepts.longName: Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine Clinical Terms
Concepts.definition: Published by the College of American Pathologists, the Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine Clinical Terms is a combination of content of SNOMED Reference Terminology and READ codes.
Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.
Named locations of or within the body.
